title: Playstation 3 & Bello!?
content:
The new European marketing for the Playstation 3 was posted on [Kotaku](http://web.archive.org/web/20130808071900/http:/www.kotaku.com/gaming/playstation-3/playstation-3s-euro-slogan-revealed-197774.php), a gaming site, and it features [Underware's Bello](http://web.archive.org/web/20130808071900/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=bello&id2=overview)! A capture is attached to this post. Not what I would've expected.

You can watch the video [here on YouTube](http://web.archive.org/web/20130808071900/http:/youtube.com/watch?v=M9rsniZ4j6k).

author: Chris Rugen

comments.content: I guess the marketing team was play-testing in their Underware.

Ah, Sony, like Superman clearly wear their Underware on the outside. So why pick [Spiderman's font for the product logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20130808071900/http:/forums.g4tv.com/messageview.cfm?catid=59&threadid=593994)?

Answer: they obviously have a super-hero complex - complete with Blue Ray Vision!

Cheers, Si

weird font choices aside (or infact included). that is a terrible piece of motion graphics.

----------  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Graphic Design, Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20130808071900/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)
That seems to be the consensus from gamers online, in response to the tagline and motion graphics.
